slide.name: Slide
slide.description: A slide animation component with configurable direction

aspect-ratio.name: Aspect Ratio
aspect-ratio.description: A responsive container that maintains a consistent aspect ratio for its content

center.name: Center
center.description: A layout utility component for centering content

pin.name: Pin
pin.description: A layout utility component for Pin content

responsive-grid.name: Responsive Grid
responsive-grid.description: A flexible grid layout component with responsive columns, gaps, equal-height option, and animations (fade, stagger, scale).

auto-grid.name: Auto Grid
auto-grid.description: A self-calculating grid layout that automatically determines columns based on available space and minimum item width, with support for max columns, gap, and balanced heights.

masonry.name: Masonry
masonry.description: A Pinterest-style layout component that arranges items of varying heights in multiple responsive columns, with support for balanced layout and entrance animations.

app-shell.name: AppShell
app-shell.description: A high-level layout component that structures the entire application frame, providing responsive navigation (side, top, or drawer), brand placement, user profile integration, and optional footer support.

fieldGroup.name: FieldGroup
fieldGroup.description: A form utility component that groups related form fields together with an optional label, description, and error message, ensuring consistent spacing and accessibility.

responsive.name: Responsive
responsive.description: A layout component that renders completely different components or layouts depending on the current device breakpoint (mobile, tablet, desktop), enabling fully adaptive user interfaces.

dialog.name: Dialog
dialog.description: A dialog-box component with animation and different variants

badge.name: Badge
badge.description: A badge component with animation and different variants

toast.name: Toast
toast.description: A toast notification component with animation and different variants

navbar.name: Navbar
navbar.description: A responsive navigation bar with animation

tabs.name: Tabs
tabs.description: A tab component with animation and different variants

breadcrumbs.name: Breadcrumbs
breadcrumbs.description: A breadcrumb navigation component with animation

sidebar.name: Sidebar
sidebar.description: A collapsible sidebar component with animation

input.name: Input
input.description: An animated input component with different variants

textarea.name: Textarea
textarea.description: An animated textarea component with different variants

tooltip.name: Tooltip
tooltip.description: An animated tooltip component with different variants

dropdown.name: Dropdown
dropdown.description: An animated dropdown component with different variants

spinner.name: Spinner
spinner.description: An animated spinner component with different variants

spacer.name: Spacer
spacer.description: A utility component that provides adjustable spacing between elements without adding extra visual content.

form.name: Form
form.description: A utility component that provides adjustable spacing between elements without adding extra visual content.

steppers.name: Steppers
steppers.description: An animated steppers component with different variants

table.name: Table
table.description: An animated table component with different variants

pagination.name: Pagination
pagination.description: An animated pagination component with different variants

card.name: Card
card.description: An animated card component with different variants

container.name: Container
container.description: A flexible container component for constraining content width with responsive padding and centering options.

section.name: Section
section.description: A layout component for creating distinct vertical blocks with consistent vertical rhythm, spacing, and background styling.

cluster.name: Cluster
cluster.description: A layout component for creating distinct group related items with consistent spacing and alignment.

breakpoint.name: Breakpoint
breakpoint.description: A flexible container component for constraining content width with responsive padding and centering options.

stack.name: Stack
stack.description: A layout component for arranging elements in a stack with adjustable spacing and alignment.

DebugBox.name: DebugBox
DebugBox.description: A development utility that overlays grid, spacing, breakpoints, and dimensions for debugging layouts.

header-layout.name: HeaderLayout
header-layout.description: A flexible layout component with header, sidebar, and footer that supports responsive design and various configuration options.

drawer.name: Drawer
drawer.description: A drawer component with animation and different variants

lazyload.name: Lazyload
lazyload.description: A layout component for lazy loading...
